name: Different Shapes Of Red
description:
Different Shapes Of Red is a quick mobile game to play when bored. Its not something complicated and for all ages.

 You play as the purple cube. you can move horizontally by touching the 2 ends of your device's  screen. Your goal is to defend you base A.K.A. the large green area from the enemies. currently there are 2 different types of enemies. The cubes and the triangles. both are randomly spawned. Triangles shoot bullets that stun(2 seconds) you upon collision. Triangles have less HP(100) and stun you for longer(3 seconds) when collided with, but deal less damage to your base (50/150). Cubes have more HP(150) don't shoot bullets but deal greater damage to your base(75/150). You must take as many of them out and survive for the longest period of time to achieve a higher high score. The game gets progressively harder with enemies spawning more often.  

After a  point in the game there is a possibility for a killed enemy to drop a token. Currently there are 2 types of tokes. The ammo token and the health token. The ammo token will drop only once per game and allow you to shoot 2 bullets at once. The health token will drop as long as the game goes and will restore your base's health. To take a token simply touch it when it comes close enough. 

The game is name your price so you can play it free or donate as much money as you want.

If the game does well i will keep updating it
